item.title: Ivolv :: About us
item.description: About Us - Who we are? Who we are? Ivolv Technologies is a leading digital technology and analytics solution provider, serving the B2B marketplace in UK and Europe. The clients served include a broad mix of private, public, and governmental organisations, across sectors like Banking, Finance, Insurance, Retail, Logistics and Supply Chain. Our company is united by a strong set of values. The quality of our team is the cornerstone of our client service.

item.title: Ivolv :: Advantage Ivolv
item.description: Home - Advantage Ivolv Advantage Ivolv Ivolv is an essential provider of bespoke artificial intelligence solutions, for global B2B companies, through targeted, customized and insightful data intelligence. We enable clients unlock value through our services by helping manage technologies efficiently, streamline systems & processes to achieve optimum performances We employ experts in data science and analysis, subject matter experts, and technology professionals. Besides, we draw in the expertise of our cross-functional teams as needed based on the project requirements and together we are committed to helping our customer progress in a growing digital world.

item.title: Ivolv :: Advantage Ivolv
item.description: Home - Advantage Ivolv Advantage Ivolv Ivolv is an essential provider of bespoke artificial intelligence solutions, for global B2B companies, through targeted, customized and insightful data intelligence. item.title: Ivolv :: Banks
item.description: Industry - Banks & finansial services Banks & finansial services Banks and Financial Services firms have recognised their most valuable asset, data. They are keen to leverage the power of data for smarter, faster and accurate decisions. Big Data and analytics are creating unique opportunities of insight and innovation across the entire spectrum of financial services. Companies are able to provide unique customer experiences and secure access to their account data—anytime, anywhere, on any device.

item.title: Ivolv :: Benefits
item.description: Home - Benefits of Data Transformations Benefits of Data Transformations In the current customer-driven marketplace, CxOs are faced with a number of challenges – gaining a 360 degree view of the customer, widening the customer outreach across ever-increasing channels and marketing campaigns, lengthening the customer life-cycle, strengthening brand image, expanding business operations, as well as proving an effective ROI. Enterprise-wide transformation is being driven by an aggressive adoption of intuitive data-driven digital technologies.

item.title: Ivolv :: Bivos
item.description: Products - AMIVOS: Asset Management Analytics Suite AMIVOS Asset Management Analytics Suite IIVOS is our Analytics Suite for Insurance Providers. It enables agents and brokers to customise dashboard views of claims, customer information, policies, sales, accounts, billing, and marketing data. This allows insurance companies to better communicate with agents, and enables agents to focus on improving service and growing revenue. With IIVOS Analytics Suite, insurers can predict and anticipate customer trends, identify new opportunities, recommend products and policies, and predict customer churn.

item.title: Ivolv :: Bivos
item.description: Products - BIVOS: Banking Analytics Suite BIVOS Banking Analytics Suite BIVOS is our flagship Analytics Suite for Banking & Financial Services. It is designed to give you and your customers secure and quick access to the information they need to make informed business decisions. Disparate data sources, both structured and unstructured, are linked and crunched to empower business users with self-service analytics. The ultimate goal being, to uncover patterns and trends that leads to actionable insights.

item.title: Ivolv :: Bivos
item.description: Products - IIVOS: Insurance Analytics Suite IIVOS Insurance Analytics Suite IIVOS is our Analytics Suite for Insurance Providers. It enables agents and brokers to customise dashboard views of claims, customer information, policies, sales, accounts, billing, and marketing data. This allows insurance companies to better communicate with agents, and enables agents to focus on improving service and growing revenue. With IIVOS Analytics Suite, insurers can predict and anticipate customer trends, identify new opportunities, recommend products and policies, and predict customer churn.

item.title: Ivolv :: Consulting Services
item.description: Services - Consulting Services Consulting Services We deliver results oriented consulting services that enrich your business planning and strategy needs. Using our portfolio of services, we can help you assess, architect, deploy and manage your evolving analytics eco-system. Our team combines business acumen, data science and deep technical skills to guide you through every step of the analytics lifecycle. We will help you transform and innovate as you deliver competitive advantages, improve operational effectiveness through creative insights using data & analytics.

item.title: Ivolv :: Consulting Services
item.description: Services - Technologies Services Technologies Services Ivolv Technologies brings on board diverse technology skills and domain experiences to provide maximum business value. We combine a deep understanding of technological ramifications with business insights to power customised business models with cutting-edge solutions. To this end, we use both established and emerging technologies that work seamlessly with your existing systems. We deliver outcomes through : Artifical Intelligence Application Development SAP implementation & support Cloud enablement IT and Information Security Previous Next Benefits of Data Transformations Empower your journey from Data to Decisions

item.description: Contact Us Email inquiry@ivolv-tech.com Telephone +44 20 7625 9425 We’re ready to lead you into the Digital World We are here to answer any questions you may have about Digital Transformations through Artificial Intelligence : Reach out to us for a quick response Address Contact Ivolv Careers ENGLAND Ivolv Technologies 44-46 Offley Road London SW9 OLS Name: * Email: * Organisation: * Title: * Phone number: * Country: * Submit @ Ivolv: always looking for Mavericks Join the Core team: Your contributions matter Join the Professional Network: Your competence counts Students: Hands on experience internships Send your CV to careers@ivolv-tech.

item.title: Ivolv :: Digital
item.description: Home - Be a Part of the Digital Revolution Be a Part of the Digital Revolution Businesses are experiencing a big change in their ecosystem caused by an unprecedented digital revolution. Where IT systems and customer-facing processes are seamlessly connected in real-time, a business can survive only to the extent that it is in sync with the external environment. Being sensitive to the evolving needs and perceptions of customers, understanding the changes occurring in technologies, improving and innovating product offerings, getting an early insight to the changes underway and knowing competition better; are increasingly becoming mandatory requirements.

item.title: Ivolv :: Digital Services
item.description: Services - Data Science Services Data Science Services At Ivolv Technologies, we deliver a wide range of customised analytics services for centralised analytics teams or individual business operations. Exceptional and deep analytics on-the-go has the ability to transform a business. We help you with glean actionable insights from your data, and power your business with easy-to-implement and measurable deliverables. Thus we transform businesses through data-driven rich insights, pruning the excess and redundant data and helping find more relevant intelligent data.

item.title: Ivolv :: Digital Services
item.description: Services - Digital Services Digital Services At Ivolv Technologies, we help power a digital transformation for your business. We look into the digital disruptions and IT innovations within your industry and repurpose your business models for high-impact results. Our focus on competitive agility relates to digital shifts, operating and business models, to help our clients find value and business growth in a digital world. Consulting Business Transformation Modelling and Analytics service Digital / Integrated Marketing effectiveness Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning End-to-end IOT development Previous Next Benefits of Data Transformations Empower your journey from Data to Decisions

item.title: Ivolv :: Digital Services
item.description: About Us - How we engage How we engage Our Approach: To Your Success We Listen: We Understand Our journey starts with understanding, we discuss, question and most importantly listen to you. We find that by exploring your eco-system together we can tailor solutions to exceed expectation. Developing a good understanding creates a solid platform for delivery and gives us the basis to perform more in depth research.

item.title: Ivolv :: Empower
item.description: Home - Empower Your Journey from Data to Decisions Empower Your Journey from Data to Decisions Our data scientists at Ivolv Technologies are experts in data correlation and use of intramural frame-works. They work along with popular technologies to collect, cleanse, store, process and visualise data for timely decisions. Machine learning and predictive analytics are used to open up new opportunities in predictive data-driven decision making. The Internet of Things and hyper mobility adoption, is transforming the way businesses function.

item.title: Ivolv :: Home
item.description: This is a data-driven digital world where changes aren’t linear; but exponential. The only way to survive is to keep pace with innovation and tie data to business growth. Digital disruption is a great opportunity for business growth Make change happen, take advantage of the new opportunities that digital technology offers. In today’s digital world, data is a driving force behind major business decisions.

item.title: Ivolv :: IIVOS PaaS
item.description: Products - IIVOS PaaS: Insurance Managed Service IIVOS PaaS Insurance Managed Service Delicated Managed Service ProductWriter® Users The IIVOS PaaS is a dedicated managed service for General Insurance users of ProductWriter®. This cloud platform enables ProductWriter® with sophisticated product definition tools and a high-performance rating engine. Price of insurance products can be easily calculated, and associated terms and conditions devised based on given variables and detailed risk analysis.

item.title: Ivolv :: Industry Ivolv
item.description: Home - Industry Ivolv Industry Banks & Finansial Insurance Travel Transportation & Logistics

item.title: Ivolv :: Insurance
item.description: Industry - Insurance Insurance Insurance companies are relying more and more on data for competitive advantage. Businesses are in a continuous state of flux, driven by unstable and transient economic and market factors. A constantly shifting regulatory climate and an unpredictable customer population, is driving uncertainties within the business. It is more important than ever that data-driven tools be used to factor uncertainties and risks, for devising premiums and designing policies.

item.title: Ivolv :: Intelligence
item.description: Home - Automate Intelligence Automate Intelligence Businesses are undergoing a paradigm shift, as they realise the power of ‘data’. Data finds increased relevance in company policies and business decisions. It is paralleled as the “Renewed Energy” as it drives change in the way companies, market and influence customer behaviour. Like energy, data reaps huge rewards for companies who see its value and learn to extract and use it.

item.title: Ivolv :: Products Ivolv
item.description: Products Products Customers are looking for information, while companies are seeking more and more customers. Digital tools, automated services and data-driven decisions are the building blocks of deeper and longer engagement with customers. At Ivolv, we tap the potential of aggregated data to enhance the digital experiences of industries we serve, by harnessing, the data with the use of technology. Our technology platforms are evolving to give our clients a better understanding of their customer portfolio to help take the appropriate data-driven decisions.

item.title: Ivolv :: Services Ivolv
item.description: Services What we do? Ivolv Technologies provides perceptive bespoke analytics and decision support services across multiple industry challenges. The services are geared for solving business challenges across the spectrum of actionable insights and recommendations. To this end, we serve as a strategic partner to our clients to consult and deliver a wide range of digital, analytics and operational services. Digital Services Data science services Consultancy services Technologies services

item.title: Ivolv :: Transportation
item.description: Transportation & logistics Transportation & logistics The Transportation and Logistics Industry is served by various industry segments like airlines, airports, railways, cruising and freight logistics. What is common to all segments is the logistics management that ensures seamless delivery of assets and freight. Transportation and Logistics provides supply chain visibility across orders, shipments, and global inventories for operational efficiencies and savings. With increase in passenger traffic and an explosion of data and devices across a dynamic IoT network, the need for real-time or near real-time insights for timely decision making is critical to business performance.

item.title: Ivolv :: Travel
item.description: Industry - Travel Travel The travel industry is data-intensive, with massive data generated at every touch point. From the moment a customer registers at an online booking portal, he creates a wealth of data – customer profile, travel preferences, flight paths, hotel bookings, destinations and more. When such information is combined with external data like social media, huge insights are obtained. Ivolv creates a unified view of travel data for reporting, analysis and forecasting.

item.title: Ivolv :: Unleasing
item.description: Home - Unleashing the power of your data Unleashing the power of your data What’s the point in having vast data at your disposal if you cannot separate the chaff from the wheat? Investing in your data is pointless unless you sift through the data maze and transform data into insights. For as customers become smarter and more informed, the marketplaces also evolve and become highly competitive.
